She couldn't believe her eye's she rubbed her eyes and saw that her vision didn't deceive her. She saw that the two heads was attached to _____ body.
1532112.title: Something else went wrong

153211222.content:
" what the hell is going on here? !!" Sakura demanded as soon as she realised the situation. "why the hell is Rocklees head on my body?!" Sakura added in anger. There was a moment of silence . " I don't know what went wrong? " tsaunade said confused. " I believe that you will be able to fix us! " Rocklee shouted pointing a thumbs up at the hokage. It was then that he noticed his new female body. He brought both his new gloved hands in front of his face and studied his hands. " tsaunade I can't move my body! " Sakura screamed in panic. " It seems that Lee has full control of your body. " tsaunade said folding her arms. " how long are we going to stay like this? " Sakura said panicking . " I am not sure, I will have to run a check up but I am sure I can reverse the effects. " tsaunade said studying Sakura's body.
" Rocklee tell me how your new body feels. " tsaunade said . Sakura and tsaunade listened carefully what rocklee was about to say. " my body feel kind of the same, although I can feel a strange emptyness between my legs and my chest feels kind of heavy." Rocklee said kind of embarrassed. Tsaunade then squeezed one of Sakura's breasts, rocklee jumped to the back. " your reflexes seems okay , be honest and tell me how that felt. " tsaunade said looking into lee's eyes . "That felt kind of good. " rocklee said embarrassed looking at the floor. " don't you ever try touching me Lee !!" Sakura said angry at him. " I will have to do some more research then I will be able to reverse the jutsu, it is better if you go home and rest. " tsaunade said opening a book.

" Call Ino at once ! " , Tsaunade yelled at Shizune . " Right my lady ." , Shizune responded and immediately left the office. " I am curious why did you choose Ino? " , the hokage asked. I also didn't want to watch choji stuff his face every time and then that left Ino , it actually is an improvement to our formation, if Ino do her mind transfer jutsu I will be able to look after her body. Ino then arrived . Tsaunade explained everything and she agreed . Tsaunade then did the jutsu...

info.brief_description: Tsunade invents a new jutsu but things turn out different.
info.description:
I got the idea for this story from a friend of mine.

One day in Konoha Tsunade creates a head swapping jutsu that could be used to extend the lives of people as well as teach new jutsu but something goes wrong with the test subjects and chaos endures.

Rules
It is set after Pain's attack on Konoha
Keep proper spelling
No gay stuff, lesbian is alright
The head decides what gender the person is so if you do something like Sasuke with a girls body and Naruto having sex that is a no go but both having girls' bodies is fine
Up to two heads con be placed on a single body
Sex is allowed and encouraged
No killing
Feel free to do anything else you want
